Test.Name: ptz6: Correct response
Test.Description:
Check SOAP FAULT MESSAGE test when DUT return correct response.
Features.286 from TestSuit\PTZ\Features_for_PTZ.xml Select PTZ node 'ptz6' on Management tab

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-3-1-2 SOAP FAULT MESSAGE
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:11569/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Getting media service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Connect to media service Media service address: http://localhost:11569/onvif/ServiceMedia10/MediaService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Searching media profile with PTZ configuration for node [token = ptz6] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Validating PTZ profile STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Validating PTZ configuration options STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Moving pan/tilt to (4, 2) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Subcode: InvalidArgVal Subcode: InvalidPosition Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.PTZ20.PtzService.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServicePTZ20\PtzService.asmx.cs:line 62 at DUT.CameraWebService.PTZ20.PtzService.AbsoluteMove(String ProfileToken, PTZVector Position, PTZSpeed Speed) in D:\!ONVIF\DUT\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServicePTZ20\PtzService.asmx.cs:line 343 STEP PASSED
TEST PASSED

Test.Name: ptz6: Wrong fault
Test.Description: Check SOAP FAULT MESSAGE test when DUT return Wrong fault. Features.286 from TestSuit\PTZ\Features_for_PTZ.xml Select PTZ node ptz6

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
PTZ-3-1-2 SOAP FAULT MESSAGE
STEP 1 - Getting PTZ service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 2 - Connect to PTZ service PTZ service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServicePTZ20/PtzService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 3 - Getting media service address Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 4 - Connect to media service Media service address: http://localhost:3246/onvif/ServiceMedia10/MediaService.asmx STEP PASSED
STEP 5 - Searching media profile with PTZ configuration for node [token = ptz6] Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 6 - Getting PTZ configuration options Transmit done Receive done STEP PASSED
STEP 7 - Validating PTZ profile STEP PASSED
STEP 8 - Validating PTZ configuration options STEP PASSED
STEP 9 - Moving pan/tilt to (4, 2) space=http://www.onvif.org/ver10/tptz/PanTiltSpaces/PositionGenericSpace Transmit done Receive done SOAP fault returned Code: Sender Subcode: InvalidArgVal Subcode: InvalidPosition1 Reason: System.Web.Services.Protocols.SoapException: MESSAGE at DUT.CameraWebService.PTZ20.PtzService.StepTypeProcessing(StepType stepType, SoapException ex, Int32 timeOut) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServicePTZ20\PtzService.asmx.cs:line 62 at DUT.CameraWebService.PTZ20.PtzService.AbsoluteMove(String ProfileToken, PTZVector Position, PTZSpeed Speed) in D:\Onvif\Version2\DUT\CameraWebService\ServicePTZ20\PtzService.asmx.cs:line 343 The SOAP FAULT returned from the DUT is invalid: fault subcodes sequence is incorrect. Expected: env:Sender/ter:InvalidArgVal/ter:InvalidPosition, actual: env:Sender/ter:InvalidArgVal/ter:InvalidPosition1 STEP FAILED
TEST FAILED
